title: Bug MAYBE??? level 3 honors
body: I am level 3 honors and I logged in today and received a key fragment.... well last time I checked level 3 honors is supposed to get an honor capsule. Is this a bug or am I wrong somehow?

replies.body: Honor capsules aren't a guaranteed drop regardless of what rank you are. They're a bonus drop that you have the chance of getting any time you would have normally gotten a key fragment.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=h1vOOZ4Q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-12T20:41:13.310+0000)
>
> Honor capsules aren't a guaranteed drop regardless of what rank you are. They're a bonus drop that you have the chance of getting any time you would have normally gotten a key fragment.

Okay, well now I am level 4 honors and I get key fragments periodically, but I have yet to get an honor capsule, been this way for about 10 days. playing 3-4 matches a day. Is there somewhere I can find the math behind all this? am I just unlucky or did I miss something I am supposed to do with the honor capsules?

I don't think so. I guess it is random how you get it:
"**Starting at level three**, Honor Capsules start to drop as well. You can expect an Honor Capsule to **occasionally drop instead of a regular key fragment**."
